tools.name: search-contacts
tools.description: Search for contacts in the CRM by name, email, phone, or company. Returns a list of matching contacts with their details.

tools.name: search-companies
tools.description: Search for companies in the CRM by name, industry, or location. Returns a list of matching companies with their details.

tools.name: search-deals
tools.description: Search for deals in the CRM by name, stage, owner, or amount range. Returns a list of matching deals with their details.

tools.name: create-contact
tools.description: Create a new contact in the CRM with name, email, phone, title, and company information.

tools.name: create-company
tools.description: Create a new company in the CRM with name, industry, location, website, and employee count information.

tools.name: create-deal
tools.description: Create a new deal in the CRM with name, amount, stage, owner, and company information.
